official_title: Recognizing the importance of honoring the Nation's children and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that National Children's Day should be established.

summary.text: Recognizes the importance of honoring the Nation's children. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Children's Day should be established in honor of the Nation's children. Encourages adult citizens of the United States to set aside time to support, embrace, and listen to a child.

titles.title: Recognizing the importance of honoring the Nation's children and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that National Children's Day should be established.
